name: Overcrowded
description: Where are you going to find enough rations to feed all these guys

description: It's not hiding, it's tactical cowering

displayName: Are you afraid of the dark?
description: It won't hurt you, I promise! Well, maybe a little...

description: Try each starting loadout

description: One shot = so many dead bugs

description: You don't need to build to win, but it does make it harder

description: Get Nick and Loren together and it's sure to be a party!

description: Go really far and get no boo boos

name: Sacrifice_Ending_1
description: You did it! You picked the boring ending, and nobody is proud of you.

name: Sacrifice_Ending_2
description: You're such a rebel! Always doing the unexpected. We approve.

name: Sacrifice_Ending_3
description: How did you find it?! It's supposed to be a secret!!!

name: FullAuto_Endless
description: You've unlocked the Full Auto RNG mode. All you had to do was play a bit of the story. Wasn't that hard, was it?

name: FullAuto_Survival
description: See how long you can survive in this game mode featuring the Full Auto kill squad.

name: BloodBros_Endless
description: Take these two badass bikers for a spin in SRIS space.

name: BloodBros_Survival
description: You did pretty good when the loot never ran out. But...what about now?

name: Lolita_Endless
description: She's got a giant hammer and a bad attitude. And she probably needs a spanking.

name: Lolita_Survival
description: You'll need all the resources you can get to keep this bad girl safe from the monsters.

name: Hobots_Endless
description: Four robots of the night will do anything when the price is right. Just make sure to bring lots of lube.

name: Hobots_Survival
description: They'll have to scavenge everything if they want to go the distance.

name: Prisoners_Endless
description: Society has turned their backs on these lunatics, and that's just how they like it. From the back, y'know. Wink wink. Nudge nudge.

name: Prisoners_Survival
description: Remember to establish dominance quickly, or you'll be calling one of these felons "Daddy".

name: Boss_Simon
description: He's big. He's pokey. He goes down like a CHUMP.

name: Boss_Murphy
description: His reach is surprising. And watch out for that third hit. :x

name: Boss_Chad
description: Who's huge, hard to take down, and yells a lot? THIS GUY!!!

name: Boss_Simon_Armored
description: Not a lot of extra armor plating where it matters, but his stinger will take out a raider in one hit.

name: Boss_Steve_Armored
description: For copyright reasons, we can't bring up the visual similarity to a certain plumber's arch-nemesis. So, we won't. But we won't stop you from thinking it.

name: Boss_Chad_Armored
description: Ok, so this guy really didn't need any additional armor. But we gave it to him anyways, because screw you. YEAH I SAID IT.

name: Boss_Steve
description: You can't cuddle with him, no matter how cuddly he looks. Unless you want to be eaten.

name: Boss_Murphy_Armored
description: He wears the bones of his fallen comrades to channel their rage directly into your raider's face.

name: 3_Pointer
description: Score a basket with a human head.

name: Slam_Dunk
description: Score a basket with anything. Yep, even the landing gear counts.

name: Hatred_Endless
description: One angry man. A legion of wriggling worms. Let the blood flow.

name: Hatred_Survival
description: Don't let the pilot's taunts distract you from your main mission: squishing every mediocre maggot on the planet.

name: Suicide_Squad
description: Mr. Akbar won't get his 72 virgins if he goes alone. He needs to take at least 10 infidels with him.

name: Orgy
description: If you thought the ideal orgy would have an even mix of men to women, I have news for you. That is not the case, my friend.

name: Fat_Lady_Sings
description: Every raider should know that you can't get between a McAmerican and their fries. Someone always pays.

name: You_Maggot
description: Really? You let him die first? What about all those other lambs that could have been sent to the slaughter?

name: Expendable
description: You lost a few bitches, but you know what? You kept the not important one. Good job.

name: All_Red
description: Everything needs to be black, white, and red. Be mindful of you accessorize.

name: Human_Kills_1
description: Kill 66 humans

name: Human_Kills_2
description: Kill 666 humans

name: Human_Kills_3
description: Kill 6,666 humans

name: Human_Kills_4
description: Kill 66,666 humans

name: Sacrifice_Hard_Ending
description: You beat the story "Sacrifice" on its hardest difficulty. Still not as hard as making it to wave 50 in Endless, but still pretty neat. Go buy yourself something nice.

name: Edgelord
description: You're so damned edgy you couldn't even stay near the center of the  map. Had to build a new base with blackjack and hookers.

name: Boss_Asher
description: He wouldn't last a second in the ring with a real MMA fighter, but don't tell his mom that. She's so proud of him.

name: Boss_Wanda
description: She was passed over for a promotion yet again, and now she's determined to bring down the patriarchy. With a knife.

name: Boss_Carl
description: Officer Carl brings his riot shotgun everywhere, especially underprivileged communities.

name: Boss_McCallahan
description: Nobody will be surprised when he shows up at the pub with blood spatters on his sleeve and files a "Missing Persons" report for his wife.

name: Boss_Pedro
description: This go-getter will stop at nothing to protect his country. Or the one he illegally snuck into.

name: Boss_Wang
description: HE IS NOT COMPENSATING FOR ANYTHING. IT IS MERELY AN EFFECTIVE TOOL.

name: Boss_Hank
description: His favorite day at work involves a no-knock raid and people who "resist arrest".

name: Boss_Cletus
description: If he buys just one more camo vest, his mom swears she will kick him out of her basement. This secretly terrifies Cletus.

name: Boss_Karen
description: She's not obese - she just has a medical condition. Known as "eats-too-much-cake-itis".
